author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Final changes that replace tbb with std

Note: requires https://github.com/AIDASoft/DD4hep/pull/723 to be merged in DD4hep master.

title: [DD4hep] Final Changes to Replace tbb with std - requires a DD4hep update
